GSD.description:
drm/amdgpu: Fix size validation for non-exclusive domains (v4)

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.19 by commit 80546eef216854a7bd47e39e828f04b406c00599. For more details please see the references link.
